alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Cobb; Forsyth; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cherokee, southwestern Forsyth, northeastern Cobb and northeastern Fulton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Birmingham, or 7 miles northeast of Mountain Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Mountain Park, Roswell, Alpharetta, Milton, Holly Springs, Free Home, Buffington, Hickory Flat, Drew, Union Hill, Brookwood, Birmingham, Holbrook, Lathemtown and Ducktown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
